wikitext.*:
'''Oarel''' pl. '''Oareldi''' also '''Aurel, Aureldi''' means "Away-elf" and is a name for the [[Amanyar]] [[Elves]].<ref>{{HM|WJ}}, [[Quendi and Eldar]]</ref> 

Although [[Quenya]], the name is from the [[Sindar]] point of view, since it refers to the Elves who departed [[Beleriand]] for [[Aman]].

==Etymology==
The [[Vanyarin]] form is ''Oazel'' and ''Auzel'' and incorporates ''[[oar]]'' "away" and ''[[eldar|el(d)]]'' "Elv". It derives from *''awazeld-''
